metadata.description: SignalWire development tools and knowledge base for building communication applications

plugins.name: signalwire-builder
plugins.description: Expert knowledge for building SignalWire applications including all SDKs, REST APIs, SWML, Relay/Fabric, AI Agents, and modern JSON/YAML-based communication systems. Includes 110+ Python examples, 24+ JavaScript examples, 44+ SWML examples, and 19 comprehensive workflow guides.
